divs: Sighting DetailsIt must be that there a holiday coming up..cause I was up all nite, last night..My dog was barking at the wall..thought Id saw thing moving..Oh and The big Orb on my neighbors house blue in color maybe 8-10 feet round...bunch of ghost in the air...I know I'm well like by the ET crowed...I Always say a smile prayer every-night to my self...and bless my body and soul by GOD and my house-dog- and the United States for all The Paranormal Stuff that my Eyes have Seen!!!! Anyways Its good Friday...How bout Some Easter Egg Orbs photo...they follow me around..daily So first photo is that large blue Orb on that house with all that ET flying around and on the ground 2ND photo...Is My Favorite Easter Egg Orbs Photo..There Plump Bright And Color-full!!! 3rd photo...Is a bunch of color-full Orbs that fallow me around at nite...You may not think that ORBS have no significant value and there just reflection of light from different light source...but your wrong when they start to change... the UFOs start showing-up...you can say there my sign of what coming next.......
Summary: 8-10 round giant ORB, plus bunch of ghost in the sky,Plu ET down to the left bottom
